It revolves around the , which inflicts Damage over Time to all mobs it passes through. As such, your highest priority starting out with this build is to clear in Dry Steppes to unlock this Aspect in your . Most Druid leveling builds these days start with this step, but this build will continue to focus on Aspects and multipliers to enhance its damage. Perhaps unintuitively, the Damage over Time effect from inherits the and Basic Skill tags from the initial cast of , which allows for some incredible scalars in the mid and late game. To that point, if you happen to find any of , they're no-brainer additions for this build.
